welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Foley, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches and friendly atmosphere. We invite you to explore and indulge in all that Foley has to offer during your stay. Enjoy your time here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Edwards Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Edwards Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pensacola NAS Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Pensacola NAS Airport is used for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pensacola International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
